{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3355710,"name":"Nicholas Armstrong","username":"narmstro","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/5e9695/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-08T22:38:01.305Z","cooked":"

I’ve got an M1 mac with xcode installed and WPILIB vscode, all up to date.
When I run ./gradlew build spotlessApply the build immediately crashes with too many errors to continue. JDK is also installed. It looks like all cpp projects are failing.

What should my setting be. I’ve gone through all of the doc setups, but I feel something is missing

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2024-04-08T22:38:01.305Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":18,"reads":113,"readers_count":112,"score":112.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":461829,"topic_slug":"building-allwpilib-on-m1-arm-mac","display_username":"Nicholas Armstrong","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":48345,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/building-allwpilib-on-m1-arm-mac/461829/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3355712,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-08T22:39:20.269Z","cooked":"

Make sure you have the right versions of clang and clang-format installed.

On mac, I’d recommend CLion and Intellij for C++/Java development.

Do you have xcode installed per allwpilib/README.md at main · wpilibsuite/allwpilib · GitHub ? Our CI builds use the macOS-12 GitHub runner with xcode 14.1 and Zulu OpenJDK 17.

Here you go.

/Users/user_name/Downloads/allwpilib/wpiutil/src/main/native/include/wpi/struct/Struct.h:332:54: error: expected ‘(’ for function-style cast or type construction
std::invocable<std::string_view, std::string_view> auto fn,
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^
/Users/user_name/Downloads/allwpilib/wpiutil/src/main/native/include/wpi/struct/Struct.h:332:56: error: expected expression
std::invocable<std::string_view, std::string_view> auto fn,
^
/Users/user_name/Downloads/allwpilib/wpiutil/src/main/native/include/wpi/struct/Struct.h:333:5: error: expected expression
const I&… info) {
^
/Users/user_name/Downloads/allwpilib/wpiutil/src/main/native/include/wpi/struct/Struct.h:333:22: error: expected ‘;’ at end of declaration
const I&… info) {
